name: Ghost Of Me
description:
TW: Murder, blood, serial killers, death

In this game, someone was murdered and he (or she) is now a ghost. You now help the ghost in choosing between taking revenge and letting go. 

Room design inspired by sample room in Bipsi.

This is my first Bitsy game. And I plan to make more Bitsy games in the future. 

Disclaimer: English is not my native language. So I apologize in advance for the grammatical mistakes and typos you might see in this game.

If you got any feedback on my work or any other questions, feel free to contact me via these social media channels:
